guideLinesLanguagesLocale: Warning: Do not alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE and currentLocale fields. They are linked to the website language. For example, changing 'en' to 'en_US' will lead to a non-existent page (e.g., https://excellence-conciergerie.com/en_US). Existing locales are pt, en, fr, es. Do not add non-existent locales. Only modify based on the current translation file. fr/common.js currentLocale should always be 'fr', en/common.js currentLocale should always be 'en', etc.
guideLinesLinks: Warning: The only accepted values for the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields in navLinks are the current website IDs, which are as follows: about, whyUs, message, subscriptions, services, faq, contact
guideLinesFormTypeOptions: Warning Text: Don't alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields. Don't add a new extra formTypeOptions object. Don't remove a existing object. If you need more forms options, contact me so I can insert it for you.

formTypeOptions.label: I want to know more about subscriptions

formTypeHelperText: For general questions, please fill out this form. If you are a homeowner, select 'I'm a homeowner' from the dropdown menu. If you want to know more about subscriptions, choose 'I want to know more about subscriptions'. If you have a question, select 'I have a question'.
thankYouForYourSubmission: Thank you for your submission. We will respond to you shortly.

array.title: 1. Introduction
array.description: Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern our relationship with you in relation to this website.

array.title: 2. License to use website
array.description: Unless otherwise stated, we or our licensors own the intellectual property rights in the website and material on the website. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved.

array.title: 3. Acceptable use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 4. Limitations of liability
array.description: We will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contact, the law of torts or otherwise) in relation to the contents of, or use of, or otherwise in connection with, this website: for any indirect, special or consequential loss; or for any business losses, loss of revenue, income, profits or anticipated savings, loss of contracts or business relationships, loss of reputation or goodwill, or loss or corruption of information or data.

array.title: 1. Information we collect
array.description: We may collect the following information: name, contact information including email address, demographic information such as postcode, preferences, and interests, other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers.

array.title: 2. What we do with the information we gather
array.description: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons: internal record keeping, improvement of our products and services, sending promotional emails about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using the email address which you have provided.

array.title: 3. Security
array.description: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

array.title: 4. How we use cookies
array.description: A cookie is a small file which asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.

heroTitle: Unforgettable Experiences and Discreet Luxury Services in Côte d'Azur and Nice

introductionDescription.text: At Excellence Conciergerie, we exceed luxury standards by creating unforgettable memories and offering extraordinary luxury concierge services in Côte d'Azur and Nice, always with absolute discretion.
For property owners, we preserve your investment with transparent and efficient luxury property management.
For travelers, we provide an exceptional and discreet experience comparable to the best 5-star hotels, ensuring excellence, service, and attention to detail.

whyUsDescription: Discover why clients trust Excellence Conciergerie for exceptional luxury property management services in Côte d'Azur and Nice. We combine expertise, personalization, and efficiency to manage properties with unparalleled professionalism and meticulous attention to detail.

whyUsReasons.title: Professionalism and Expertise
whyUsReasons.description: Our experienced team ensures comprehensive management of luxury properties, maximizing visibility on prestigious platforms. Seasoned professionals craft captivating descriptions to highlight unique features.

whyUsReasons.title: Personalized Service
whyUsReasons.description: We tailor solutions to meet your unique needs, ensuring a smooth and personalized experience throughout the luxury property management process. Our team prioritizes your objectives to enhance property value and client satisfaction.

whyUsReasons.title: Profitability Optimization
whyUsReasons.description: Excellence Conciergerie uses strategic approaches to maximize rental income and investment returns for property owners in Côte d'Azur and Nice. Through market analysis and effective management techniques, we ensure profitability.

whyUsReasons.title: Comprehensive Management
whyUsReasons.description: We offer full luxury property management services, providing peace of mind for owners. From coordinating maintenance to guest relations, our dedicated team ensures smooth operation and efficiency of your property.

whyUsReasons.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsReasons.description: We stay at the forefront with innovative solutions and insights into the luxury real estate market. Whether implementing technologies for efficient operations or adapting to market trends, we enhance performance and client satisfaction.

messageDescription: Welcome to Excellence Conciergerie. As the General Director, I am delighted to welcome you. For property owners, we care for your property with passion and confidentiality in Côte d'Azur and Nice. For travelers, we promise an exceptional and discreet experience. Excellence Conciergerie embodies refinement, discretion, and personal attention. Welcome to excellence.

services.title: Complete Property Management
services.description: Excellence Conciergerie manages all aspects of your luxury property in Côte d'Azur and Nice, ensuring both interior and exterior maintenance. Our detailed weekly reports provide transparent updates on each service, keeping you informed.

pros.text: Solutions tailored to your unique needs.

services.title: Exclusive Partnerships with Industry Leaders
services.description: We maintain exclusive partnerships with construction companies, architects, interior designers, landscapers, and more. This ensures superior quality interventions and enhances the value and appeal of your property.

pros.text: Personalized services to aesthetically enhance the property.

services.title: Luxurious Outdoor Space Maintenance
services.description: Our dedicated teams preserve the beauty of your outdoor spaces in Côte d'Azur and Nice, from meticulous garden care to expertise in pool maintenance. We ensure that the exterior of your property remains a serene oasis.

pros.text: Specialized care to enhance and beautify outdoor spaces.
Tailored services to preserve and enhance property aesthetics.
Regular maintenance to keep in impeccable condition.
Specialized solutions for luxurious property maintenance.

services.title: Personalized and Exclusive Services
services.description: We offer bespoke and exclusive services to exceed your expectations in property management. From specialized care to transparent communication, we ensure excellence in every detail.

pros.text: Customized solutions for all your property needs.
Commitment to excellence and client satisfaction.
Personalized approach to meet exclusive client preferences.

packsSubtitle: The perfect plan for every lifestyle.

packs.title: Excellence Basic
packs.subTitle: Monday to Friday, from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM

pros.text: Solutions tailored to your unique needs.

packs.title: Excellence Premium
packs.subTitle: 7 days a week, with flexible scheduling

pros.text: Priority access to our exclusive partners.
Exclusive access to our high-level services.

faq.title: What services does Excellence Conciergerie offer?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie offers a full range of luxury property management services in Côte d'Azur and Nice, including maintenance, security, booking management, and personalized services for property owners and travelers.

faq.title: How does Excellence Conciergerie's 24/7 surveillance work?
faq.description: Our 24/7 surveillance relies on advanced technologies and a dedicated team to ensure a rapid response to any incidents, guaranteeing complete security for your property.

faq.title: What are the benefits of Excellence Conciergerie's exclusive partnerships?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie maintains exclusive partnerships with construction companies, architects, interior designers, and other professionals. This ensures high-quality interventions to enhance and maintain the aesthetic value of your property.

faq.title: Why choose Excellence Conciergerie to manage my luxury property?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie stands out for its commitment to excellence, transparency in every service provided, and its ability to deliver tailored solutions that precisely meet your needs. We are committed to keeping your property immaculate and well-maintained at all times.

faq.title: What are the cancellation terms for Excellence Conciergerie's services?
faq.description: You can cancel our services at any time by contacting us directly. We strive to make the cancellation process as simple and transparent as possible for our clients.

faq.title: How can I make a special request to Excellence Conciergerie?
faq.description: For any special requests, whether specific needs for your property or personalized services for an event, please contact us directly. We are here to meet your specific needs and provide a tailored solution.

contactDescription: Are you ready to elevate your hospitality and commit to excellence in Côte d'Azur and Nice? Please fill out the form below, and our team will contact you shortly to discuss how we can help provide unforgettable stays for your clients.
footerDescription: Excellence Conciergerie is a luxury property management agency based in Côte d'Azur and Nice. Our dedicated team offers personalized services to meet the unique needs of each owner.
thankYouDescription: We appreciate you getting in touch. Our team will review your message and respond as soon as possible.
additionalInfo: In the meantime, feel free to explore our website further.
